description: The Zeikos Power grip for the Canon 50D/40D is the perfect solution for doubling your shooting time. It holds either 2 BP511 Lithium-Ion Rechargeable batteries or 6 AA batteries. It has a vertical firing release with a lock and dramatically improves stability. It has a 1 year warranty.
title: Zeikos ZE-CBG50 Battery Power Grip for Canon 40D & 50D
